# MKScaleView.Alignment.center

**Case**

Scale measurements appear horizontally centered within the view.

## Declaration

```swift
case center
```

## Discussion

The framework depicts the scale view distance using a legend that grows and shrinks around its horizontal center point.

## Alignment options

- **MKScaleView.Alignment.leading**: Scale measurements begin at the leading edge of the view.
- **MKScaleView.Alignment.trailing**: Scale measurements begin at the trailing edge of the view.
